narrative.inOrderTo: communicate effectively to the business some functionality

scenario.title: Accounts - logged out state
scenario.step: Then Oracle and Cloud Sign In panel must be stacked

scenario.title: Accounts - logged in state
scenario.step: Given user is logged in Oracle account
Then user name and heading Oracle account must be displayed

scenario.title: Accounts - Oracle Account links verify
scenario.step: Given user is logged in Oracle account

Then User verify Oracle account must have links:
Option Sign Out Account Help

scenario.title: Accounts - Cloud Sign In links verify
scenario.step: Given user is logged in Oracle account

Then User verify Oracle signin must have links:
Option Sign Up—Free Trial Sign in
